description: You awaken in a decaying log cabin deep in the woods. A storm rages outside. The smell of mildew and something metallic fills the air.

rooms.description: A flickering candle casts shadows across the warped floorboards. A locked door creaks in the wind.
Dust and cobwebs blanket old furniture. A cracked mirror reflects your pale face.
Moisture drips from the ceiling. Rusted chains hang from the walls.

candle.name: Flickering Candle
candle.description: A half-melted candle providing dim, wavering light.

door.name: Locked Door
door.description: A heavy wooden door with rusty hinges. It's locked tight.

note.name: Crumpled Note
note.description: A water-stained note with barely legible handwriting.

mirror.name: Cracked Mirror
mirror.description: An old mirror with a spider web of cracks across its surface.

chest.name: Wooden Chest
chest.description: A dusty old chest with a rusted lock.

lantern.name: Old Lantern
lantern.description: A rusted lantern that might still work.

chains.name: Rusted Chains
chains.description: Heavy chains hanging from the wall, covered in rust.

skeleton.name: Skeleton
skeleton.description: The skeletal remains of someone who wasn't so lucky.
